question:
You recently bought a new Television online,However when it arrived you found that it had a problem.You called the customer services,but were not satisfied with the responce.
Write a letter to the company ,In your letter.
Introduce yourself
Explain the situation.
Explain what you want the company to do.
text: My name is Dima Grigoriev, I was your loyal customer for the last 3 years. I have been pretty happy with all my purchases using your "Happy Gadget" store, but now I must refer you to this complaint.

Firstly, I bought a flat-screen 65" TV of LG brand, model 65UNV-E on May, 14. It was delivered fast, and the service was nice. But after unpacking and switching it on at my home I found a lot of defective pixels on the screen. They change the colour of the image and shine white even in dark scenes. Moreover, they provide contrast colours on white pictures, for example, red or green. I have sent a legal notice to your customer service, but they answered that some flawed pixels are not covered with a guarantee, hence, it is not out of the legal terms. In this case, the number of non-working pixels is more than ten, so I can not agree with this position being a practising lawyer.

In general, I liked this LG model and I do not want to claim a refund. I would be very pleased if you could provide me with the same product in an appropriate condition. I can even reimburse the delivery expenses for the substitute.
Looking forward to your appropriate actions.
